import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { fetchSessionTV, } from "../../../service"; import "react-bootstrap-carousel/dist/react-bootstrap-carousel.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../../TV/Style.css"; export function Seasons({match}) { let params = match.params; const [Seasions, setSession] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchAPI = async () => { setSession(await fetchSessionTV(params.id)); }; fetchAPI(); }, []); // Danh sách phát sóng mới nhất const listSession = Seasions.slice(0, 20).map((c, i) => { return (
